fields.Title: American Poetry in the American Century
fields.Description/Abstract:
My book project analyzes poetry about America’s rise in power after World War II.  I will research & draft 2 chapters, one about W. S. Merwin’s 325-page The Folding Cliffs, and another about colonization and Native Americans (especially in books by Simon Ortiz, Gerald Vizenor, Louise Erdrich, and William Heyen).
Partners:  I have applied for research grants from Idaho Humanities Council, the American Council of Learned Societies, and a semester fellowship from the BSU Arts and Humanities Institute.
I have also applied for  a sabbatical from BSU in fall 2013.
Role:  Principal
